title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 2
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 2
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Zumiez (ZUMZ). Zumiez Inc.'s shares fell to their lowest price since January 2010 after the retailer of action-sports clothing and equipment forecast an unexpected second-quarter loss. The loss may be as much as 11 cents a share. Analysts expected a profit of 1 cent a share on average, according to a Bloomberg survey. Zumiez' first-quarter loss widened from a year ago.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
